entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Rain along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except rainfall amount 2 mm along parts of the coast.
